title: Read and Parse px files
text: px file format format offering statistical tables interactive way. introduced Statistics office Sweden also used statistical offices countries. See specification format: px file format specification goal pxRRead parse px cube files: - download url px cube file - px cube file downloaded previously

title: Read and Parse px files
text: goal package prepare data metadata data science applications. package especially meant also support large multilingual px files allow localize supported language. output consist list data metadata: - output$metadata includes metadata default language - output$dataframe tibble length DATA px cube - dimensions “STUB” “HEADING” px cube turned columns tibble

what: Option to localize the output for multilingual px cubes
title: Read and Parse px files
text: px cube multilingual: locale can specified locale=<language code> localize output: metadata dataframe use translations given locale. language code must match language code used px cube specified LANGUAGES keyword.
